title: Radio Replay: The Weight of Our Words
description: Political correctness. Free speech. Terrorism. On this week's Radio Replay, we look at the language we use around race and religion, and what that language says about the culture in which we live. This episode draws upon two of our favorite podcasts, "Is He Muslim?" and "Hiding Behind Free Speech."
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
